pages.about-us: About Us - ChairMart: Elevating Your Comfort and Style ChairMart HOME ABOUT US Chairs Contact About ChairMart ChairMart is your premier destination for high-quality chairs, ranging from ergonomic office chairs to stylish lounge chairs and dining chairs. We pride ourselves on offering a wide selection of comfortable and durable seating solutions for homes and offices. Our mission is to provide exceptional comfort and style through our curated collection of chairs, ensuring every customer finds the perfect piece to suit their needs and preferences. Visit ChairMart today and discover why we are trusted by homeowners, interior designers, and businesses alike for their seating solutions. Latest Updates Explore Our New Chair Collections Discover our latest chair collections featuring ergonomic designs, premium materials, and stylish finishes. Find the perfect chair to elevate your space with ChairMart! Tips for Choosing the Right Chair Choosing the right chair is crucial for comfort and productivity. Check out our expert tips on selecting chairs that suit your needs and enhance your daily activities. ChairMart Rated Top Chair Retailer We're proud to be recognized as a top chair retailer! Thank you to our valued customers for your trust and support. Experience our exceptional chairs and discover why ChairMart stands out. Join Us for Our Annual Chair Expo Don't miss our annual Chair Expo! Join us for exclusive previews of new chair arrivals, expert advice on ergonomic seating, and special discounts. Elevate your comfort with ChairMart! Elevating Comfort and Style Discover how ChairMart is dedicated to providing ergonomic comfort and stylish designs that enhance your living and working spaces. From cutting-edge ergonomic research to versatile chair selections, we're committed to optimizing your comfort and productivity. Explore our curated collections today! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - ChairMart: Protecting Your Personal Information ChairMart HOME ABOUT US Chairs Contact Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to ChairMart (the "Company", "we", "our", "us")! We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience while visiting our website (the "Site") and using our services (the "Services"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our Site and use our Services. Information We Collect We may collect personal information and non-personal information from you when you interact with us, including: Your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information when you contact us or register for an account. Payment information, such as credit card details, when you make a purchase. Information automatically collected when you visit our Site, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for various purposes, including: To provide, operate, and maintain our Site and Services. To improve our Site and Services and personalize your experience. To process your transactions and provide customer support. To send you promotional emails, newsletters, and other communications. Security of Your Information We take reasonable measures to protect the information we collect from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. Your Choices and Rights You may have certain rights regarding your personal information under applicable law. To exercise these rights or to opt-out of certain data collection and use, please contact us using the information provided below. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date above. The ChairMart website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline ChairMart Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - ChairMart: Terms of Use and Purchase ChairMart HOME ABOUT US Chairs Contact Terms and Conditions These terms and conditions ("Terms", "Agreement") are an agreement between ChairMart ("Company", "us", "we", or "our") and you ("User", "you", or "your"). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the ChairMart website and any of its products or services (collectively, "Website" or "Services"). Accounts and Membership If you create an account on the Website, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with it. Providing false contact information of any kind may result in the termination of your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. We will not be liable for any acts or omissions by you, including any damages of any kind incurred as a result of such acts or omissions. Acceptable Use You agree not to use the Website for any unlawful purpose, or any purpose prohibited under this Agreement. You agree not to use the Website in any way that could damage the Website, the services, or the general business of ChairMart. Intellectual Property The Website and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by ChairMart and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws. Termination We may terminate your access to the Website, without cause or notice, which may result in the forfeiture and destruction of all information associated with your account. All provisions of this Agreement that by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold ChairMart and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents harmless from and against any liabilities, losses, damages, or costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, incurred in connection with or arising from any third-party allegations, claims, actions, disputes, or demands asserted against any of them as a result of or relating to your Content, your use of the Website or Services, or any willful misconduct on your part. Limitation of Liability In no event shall ChairMart, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Website; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Website; (iii) any content obtained from the Website; and (iv) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage, and even if a remedy set forth herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose. Changes and Amendments We reserve the right to modify this Agreement or its policies relating to the Website or Services at any time, effective upon posting of an updated version of this Agreement on the Website. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. Continued use of the Website after any such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes. Acceptance of These Terms You acknowledge that you have read this Agreement and agree to all its terms and conditions. By using the Website or its Services, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of this Agreement, you are not authorized to use or access the Website and its Services.
